APPropriate saves your most recent data so that you can leave your phone at home.\n\nThe next few screens will help you get set up and choose what media to synchronise, then set a PIN so that nobody else can access your data.
Enter the four-digit number written on the back of your APPropriate
Now, set your PIN – this should be a four-digit number that only you know. Please don\'t tell anybody else this number.
Type your new PIN again, so we can check you entered it correctly.
Pick which types of data you would like to save to your APPropriate. You can always change your mind later in Settings.
APPropriate is now ready to use.\n\nPress done to continue – and don\'t hesitate to get in touch if you encounter any problems.
If you don\'t have your own APPropriate, or would like to set yours up later, you can skip setup for now.\n\nTo continue setup now, press cancel.
If you don\'t want to change your PIN, or have already changed it, you can skip this step for now. You can always change your PIN later in Settings.\n\nTo change your PIN now, press cancel.
